title: Cancel a Room Reservation
description: A student club needs to cancel their reservation for a meeting room.

tasks.description: Identify the student group and the specific reservation to be cancelled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct booking in the system.

tasks.description: Process the cancellation in the facility scheduling system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the booking, freeing up the room.

tasks.description: Send a cancellation confirmation to the event organizer.
